titleStmt.title: By His Majesties license, and special approbation of the true orvietan, or antidote
titleStmt.author: Tilburg, Cornelius.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Cornelius Tilburg. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
